About

LinkedIn Github Twitter YouTube

Hi, I am Wlademir Ribeiro Prates. Welcome to my personal blog.

I am a Senior Data Scientist. Experienced R and Shiny developer, with examples of use cases in several large companies. Experienced with machine learning implementation to solve business problems. PhD and Master’s in Finance. Researcher in behavioral finance / economics, and capital markets. I also have a website, where articles about business, technology and data science are published.

Education

  • 2012-2016 - PhD in Finance (UFSC)
  • 2010-2012 - Master’s in Finance (UFSC)
  • 2006-2009 - Undergraduate in Business Administration (Anhanguera)
